<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create a new survey"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/new"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new satisfaction survey with questions and configuration settings.

**Workflow Example**
1. Create survey: POST /api/v1.0/surveys/new with survey definition
2. Extract `ItemId` (SurveyId) from response
3. Activate when ready: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/activate](/docs/api/surveys/activate-survey)
4. Create rule to assign survey to tickets (via Rules API)

**Configuration Options**:
- `ExpirationInDays`: Days before survey expires (null = never)
- `RemindOnDays`: Array of days to send reminders (e.g., [1, 3, 7])
- `Questions`: Array of question definitions with types and required flags

**Notes**: New surveys are created inactive by default. Use activate endpoint when ready to start collecting responses.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"A satisfaction survey that can be assigned to users after ticket resolution.","properties":{"SurveyId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the survey."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product this survey belongs to."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site this survey is associated with."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the survey was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the survey was last modified."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the survey."},"Intro":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Introductory text shown to users before the survey questions."},"IsActive":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the survey is currently active and can be assigned."},"ExpirationInDays":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Number of days after assignment before the survey expires."},"RemindOnDays":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Days after assignment when reminder notifications are sent (e.g., [1, 3, 7])."},"Questions":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"A question within a survey, including its type and response when used in survey responses.","properties":{"SurveyQuestionId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the question."},"SurveyQuestionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Type of question (e.g., text, rating, multiple choice)."},"Question":{"type":"string","description":"The question text displayed to the user."},"Response":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The user's response to this question (populated in survey responses)."},"IsRequired":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this question must be answered to submit the survey."}},"title":"SurveyQuestion"},"description":"List of questions included in this survey."}},"title":"Survey"},"example":{"Name":"IT Support Satisfaction Survey","Intro":"Thank you for contacting IT Support. Please take a moment to rate your experience.","IsActive":false,"ExpirationInDays":7,"RemindOnDays":[1,3],"Questions":[{"SurveyQuestionTypeId":"e1111111-2222-3333-4444-555555555555","Question":"How satisfied were you with the resolution?","IsRequired":true},{"SurveyQuestionTypeId":"e2222222-3333-4444-5555-666666666666","Question":"How would you rate the technician's communication?","IsRequired":true},{"SurveyQuestionTypeId":"e3333333-4444-5555-6666-777777777777","Question":"Any additional feedback?","IsRequired":false}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
